title: Corporacion Javascript Chile
descripcion: JavaScript Chile is a non-profit, helping create and develop initiatives that improve the Developer community and ecosystem in Chile. Its the team behing JSConf, 418.

title: Status 418
descripcionCorta: A livestream/podcast on Developer Community and Technology
descripcion: Status 418 is a space where technology and community meet to explore, learn and grow together. We come together here to unravel the mysteries of the digital world, share our experiences, and most importantly, learn from each other.

title: JSConf Chile
descripcion: JSConf Chile is a community-driven conference, made for developers by developers, with a very clear objective. Fostering the JavaScript engineering community in Chile, beyond its geographical limits.

title: Noders
descripcionCorta: A JavaScript and NodeJS community in Latin America.
descripcion: We focus on helping the JS community grow and thrive by creating Meetups, events, hackathons, conferences and free lessons.

title: Preguntas Entrevistas Frontend
descripcionCorta: A repo of questions and answers for frontend interviews.
descripcion: We aim to have a spanish written repo with frontend interviews questions, and it's answers, for studying purposes, as well as tips for both interviewers and candidates.

title: FForres Groupon Site!
descripcionCorta: An opensource repo imitating groupon's UI selling me
descripcion: We aim to have a spanish written repo with frontend interviews questions, and it's answers, for studying purposes, as well as tips for both interviewers and candidates.

title: EventLoop2016
descripcionCorta: Opensource - non-profit 2 day Hackathon for JavaScript & NodeJS Devs.
descripcion: An opensource - non-profit hackathon focused on BigData, Data Visualization, OSS, Javascript & NodeJS (Thanks to the Ciudad the MÃ©xico JS (meetup.com/es-ES/eventloop) community for the right to use the name).

title: MeetupJS Santiago
descripcion: A Monthly JavaScript meetup! By geeks, for geeks, because we like it (Brought by the awesome team @ Noders).

title: NodeSchool Santiago
descripcion: We organize events to let people learn and have fun with JS (It works awesome!).

title: In Plain.js
descripcion: Aim to replicate website's UI / Widgets / Projects in plain old CSS/JS/HTML for learning purposes.

title: ImpactON 2015
descripcion: OpenSource and collaborative hackathon with an aim on creating and validating social impact projects. Getting together Academia, entrepreneurs, private sector and government.
